knimeNode.name: Delegating Loop End
knimeNode.shortDescription: The loop end node for performing delegating, a version of meta learning.

fullDescription.intro:
The data passed to port 0 is collected and passed to the output. The data in port 1 is returned to the delegating loop start.
E.g. Port 0 is collecting the PMML cells. Port 1 contains the false predicted data points.

ports.inPort: Data to be collected for the output
Data to be passed back to loop start.
ports.outPort: The rows collected from the first in port.
